com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.services

Interface FileRepository

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FileManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileManagerImpl, FileRepositoryDelegate, LocalFileRepository

    public interface FileRepository
    Interface for a single file repository, allowing storing and getting of a single file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileDescriptor createFile()
      Create a new file in the repository.
      boolean delete(FileDescriptor descriptor)
      Deletes a file from the repository.
      boolean exists(FileDescriptor descriptor)
      Checks if a descriptor actually points to an existing file.
      File getAsFile(FileDescriptor descriptor)
      Gets the file contents as a File instance.
      InputStream getInputStream(FileDescriptor descriptor)
      Get an InputStream to read the contents of the file.
      OutputStream getOutputStream(FileDescriptor descriptor)
      Get an OutputStream that can be used to update the contents of the file.
      String getRepositoryId() 
      boolean move(FileDescriptor source, FileDescriptor target)
      Moves the file "original" into "renamed", which may not exist yet.
      FileDescriptor moveInto(File file)
      Moves a File into the repository, once the file is fully available in the repository an attempt will be made to delete the original file.
      FileDescriptor save(File file)
      Stores a file in the repository, but leaves the original file alone.
      FileDescriptor save(InputStream inputStream)
      Stores an InputStream as a new file in the repository.

    • Method Detail

      • getRepositoryId

        String getRepositoryId()
        Returns:
        The unique id of the file repository.

      • createFile

        FileDescriptor createFile()
        Create a new file in the repository. This allocates the file instance, but the content of the file is empty. What exactly empty means depends on the implementation of the repository.
        Returns:
        FileDescriptor instance.

      • moveInto

        FileDescriptor moveInto(File file)
        Moves a File into the repository, once the file is fully available in the repository an attempt will be made to delete the original file.

        No exception will be thrown if the delete fails as the new instance will be available in the repository already and this is considered the important part of the transaction.

        Parameters:
        file - File instance to move into the repository.
        Returns:
        FileDescriptor instance.

      • save

        FileDescriptor save(File file)
        Stores a file in the repository, but leaves the original file alone. If you want to move a temporary file to the repository and delete it immediately when done, use moveInto(java.io.File) instead.
        Parameters:
        file - File instance to save in the repository.
        Returns:
        FileDescriptor instance.

      • save

        FileDescriptor save(InputStream inputStream)
        Stores an InputStream as a new file in the repository.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - InputStream of the file content.
        Returns:
        FileDescriptor instance.

      • delete

        boolean delete(FileDescriptor descriptor)
        Deletes a file from the repository.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - FileDescriptor instance.
        Returns:
        True if delete was successful, false if not (delete failed or file did not exist).

      • getOutputStream

        OutputStream getOutputStream(FileDescriptor descriptor)
        Get an OutputStream that can be used to update the contents of the file. No matter the repository implementation, writes to the OutputStream should replace the existing contents. Depending on the implementation, this can happen on close(), flush() or instantaneously.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - FileDescriptor instance.
        Returns:
        OutputStream that can be used to update the contents of the file.

      • getInputStream

        InputStream getInputStream(FileDescriptor descriptor)
        Get an InputStream to read the contents of the file. Reading the stream *should not be done more than once* to ensure compatibility across FileRepository implementations. Once a stream has been consumed, a new InputStream should be requested of the repository. If the file does not exist null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - FileDescriptor instance.
        Returns:
        InputStream for the contents of the file.

      • getAsFile

        File getAsFile(FileDescriptor descriptor)
        Gets the file contents as a File instance. This file *should not be used for writing* as the file instance might be a local cached instance depending on the implementation. If you want to write directly you should use getOutputStream(com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.business.FileDescriptor).
        Parameters:
        descriptor - FileDescriptor instance.
        Returns:
        File instance.

      • exists

        boolean exists(FileDescriptor descriptor)
        Checks if a descriptor actually points to an existing file.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - FileDescriptor instance.
        Returns:
        True if the file exists.

      • move

        boolean move(FileDescriptor source,
             FileDescriptor target)
        Moves the file "original" into "renamed", which may not exist yet.

        An IllegalArgumentException will be thrown if the two are not in the same repository.
        Parameters:
        source - FileDescriptor instance of the original file.
        target - FileDescriptor instance of the wanted resulting file.
        Returns:
        True if the file was successfully moved.
